availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel W. Owens (Ballard County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Julia F. Owens. Father of Isabella F. Owens, Samuel J. Owens, John W. Owens, Alva T. Owens, and Ann D. Owens. Carpenter in Ballad County in 1850. Merchant in Ballard County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 304B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Milburn District, p. 92. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District No. 3, p. 41. Find A Grave, "Samuel W. Owens (1821-1888)," Memorial #94102566, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94102566&ref=acom (accessed September 21, 2017).
